meeting_info.location: Council Chambers, 6th Floor, City Hall and via video conference

agenda_items.title: Approval of December 12, 2023 Charter Review Commission Meeting Minutes
agenda_items.description: Approval of the minutes from the previous meeting.

agenda_items.title: Charter Review Commission Amendment Review Schedule and Process
agenda_items.description: Discussion on the schedule and process for reviewing proposed amendments.

agenda_items.title: Allow the City Manager to submit an estimated budget
agenda_items.description: Amendment to allow the City Manager to submit an estimated budget to the city council by August 15th instead of on August 15th.

agenda_items.title: Amend City Council candidate residency requirements
agenda_items.description: Amendment to align City Council candidate residency requirements with the Election Code.

agenda_items.title: Delete requirement for city secretary verification
agenda_items.description: Amendment to delete the requirement that the city secretary verify the truth in a filed affidavit of residency.

agenda_items.title: Provision for alternate deadline
agenda_items.description: Add a provision to allow for an alternate deadline when the last day of performance of an act falls on a weekend or holiday.

agenda_items.title: Amend provision related to council members paying taxes
agenda_items.description: Amend the provision related to members of the city council paying taxes liabilities due the city.

agenda_items.title: Amend language for accruing liens
agenda_items.description: Amend language to allow the city to accrue liens on a monthly basis.

agenda_items.title: Amend personnel appeal deadline
agenda_items.description: Amend personnel appeal deadline to be consistent with personnel rules.

agenda_items.title: Revise language on probationary periods
agenda_items.description: Revise language clarifying that a civilian probationary period does not satisfy the requirement for sworn service probationary periods.

agenda_items.title: Remove voter registration requirement for petitions
agenda_items.description: Amendment to remove the voter registration requirement for petitions.
